column3: 대사
'There's a suspicious person standing in front of me.'
'How do I....'⊙④
(Luckily^ I was able to move on without being seen.)⊙⑤
column4: 은밀행동 성공 -> 화면 암전이후 이동 -> 맵생성

column3: (The attempt to sneak past failed.)
(The figure approached me with a look of intense hostility that said it didn't care about my excuses.)
@Damn...@⊙⑥
@Wait... I don't recognize you there. Stop.@
'Oh my... Did I get caught?'
@I'll have to make excuses it somehow.@⊙⑦
(I somehow managed to get away with it.)
'Let's get out of here quickly.'⊙⑤
'Oh ... I think I've been found out...!'
'I can't help^ it I have to deal with it.'⊙⑥
(A map that looks outdated.)☆①
(It's a weird map where the roads look weirdly intertwined.)
'This is why I felt like the paths were strangely intertwined...'
'Anyway^ this will make it easier to get around.'
(This is an old note.)☆①
@Let's take a look...@
(The notes were written in very dirty handwriting and were quite illegible^ but appeared to be some sort of plan and journal.)
⒳Cthulhu's advent is made possible by a contract with Dagon^ a (planetary parade) when the veil between the Otherworld and reality is thinned.ⓦ
⒳The location was crucial because five symbols needed to be carved for advent^ and if the symbols were damaged before the ceremony^ the advent would fail.ⓦ
⒳The best place to hide the symbols and work on it seems to be the (sewers) of Arkham.ⓦ
⒳Let's contact people's dreams there and choose the respondent who will be the living sacrifice.ⓦ
⒳We brought in deep-one from Innsmouth and started working under the (sewers).ⓦ
⒳Intimidating the stupid-looking (sewer warden) was a piece of cake. ⓦ
⒳His wife and children have already been sacrificed^ but he does everything in his power to keep his family safe. Funny.ⓦ
⒳To make it easier for deep-one to operate^ we've carved a marker into the (sewers).ⓦ
⒳There will be a slight (fishy smell)^ but it's (sewage) and people won't care.ⓦ
⒳Four symbols have already been carved^ and only one remains. The final sacrifice is a journalist named (Aiden triss) who has been scouring the area.ⓦ
⒳(Aiden) has been kidnapped. A henchman accidentally killed his wife^ but it's not a big deal now.ⓦ
⒳Advent is just around the corner.ⓦ
⒳I've marked the location of the last symbol on the map. Be careful because I've left fewer people to avoid detection.ⓦ
@P.S. If there is a disturbance^ it is permitted to accompany 'THAT'...@◐①
@Deep-One? Cthulhu? I don't know what the hell they're talking about...@
@At the very least^ I'm pretty sure that the guy who wrote this journal is behind everything that's happening in the city right now.@
@A symbol on the map... so erasing it may solve the problem.@
@I don't believe it^ but if that doesn't keep this shitty dream going... It might not be a bad idea to try.@
(It's a strange book covered in green moss.)☆①
(The moment I open this strangely blasphemous book^ strange words are etched into my cornea.)
(A bunch of letters cluttering my brain reminds me of something.)◐②
(Intense dizziness and a headache that felt like it was crushing my eyeballs^ but I couldn't close the book.)
(Somewhere around the time I started seeing pictures and letters....)◐③
(I could understand what the letters meant.)
'This is.... It's a book about the rituals of ⓑ(●4Cthulhu's advent)ⓦ.'
'The method is simple... just smear the blood of the sacrifice on the already carved symbols...'
@Damn^ I read the wrong thing.@
(I tried to come up with something^ but the words and characters eventually drifted out of my head.)
@Damn^ I read the wrong thing.@
(It's grooved in a strange symbol.)
(The shape itself looks profane^ but it doesn't feel anything yet.)☆①
@This must be the symbol I saw in that journal.@
@If I break this^ I can disrupt it...?@
@I'll just have to scrape it off with a rock I have lying around.@
(A blasphemous-looking symbol is carved into the wall.)
'It seems to be a symbol used to summon something.''
(Nothing in particular came to mind.)
(I picked up a rock lying around and slammed it down on the symbol.)
(When the existing form of the symbol becomes unrecognizable.)
(An image began to form in my head.)
@This... this is... what the hell...@◐⑤
(I picked up a rock lying around and slammed it down on the symbol.)
@Ugh!@※⑧
(The stone then bounced and hit me near the eye.)
(And an image began to form in my brain.)
@This... this is... what the hell...@◐⑤
@Whoa...@
(I barely managed to resist its intense force.)
(As if possessed by something^ I made a cut in my hand and brought it to the symbol.)
'What? What am I doing?'
(Then the walls began to fill with a reddish color^ as if they were absorbing my blood.)
(I don't think it has anything to do with this symbol.)
